content.title: Flow (In Progress)
content.description: This projects was created to allow a user to create and visualize a workflow pipeline. As tasks are created, they can be moved through the pipeline. This enables you to keep track of all the tasks you're working on and their statuses within a project.
content.tech: JavaScript, HTML, CSS, React, Node.js, MongoDB

content.title: Real-Time Messaging
content.description: Messaging services such a Facebook Messenger, Skype, and Discord are huge. I wanted to take a shot at creating a real-time messaging service as well.
content.tech: JavaScript, HTML, CSS, React, Node.js, MongoDB

content.title: URL Shortener
content.description: URL Shorteners are a pretty straight forward back end project. I developed one to reinforce my Node.js skills
content.tech: JavaScript, HTML, CSS, React, Node.js, MongoDB

content.title: WETnet
content.description: This was my senior design project that was developed with the help of SDG&E. I worked with a team of 19 engineers to design an ultra low-power, campus-wide weather network that collected granular weather and environmental data
